attributes.action: Convicted Rioters should lose all benefits!
attributes.additional_details:
Convicted rioters chose to steal and damage their local communities. To avoid the Tax payer paying for their lifestyle all convicted rioters should lose their benefits, Council property and should be made to re-build the community in addition to any other sentence imposed.

In addition, parents/guardians of juveniles convicted of Rioting should be held responsible under the aid/abetting  definition.
